job_description:
Position: QA Automation Engineer

Job Type: Full Time/Remote

Project: One of the Fortune 500's

Responsibilities

Work collaboratively within an agile development team, participating in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and grooming sessions.
Create and maintain test frameworks, implementing best practices for code reusability and maintainability.
Identify, report, and track defects throughout the software development life cycle, providing detailed information for efficient resolution.
Document test plans, test cases, and test results comprehensively, ensuring full traceability and clear reporting.

Requirements

Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.
Extensive hands on professional experience in quality assurance and software testing.
Strong experience in implementing and working on frameworks including JAVA, Selenium, & REST-Assured.
Proficiency in designing, developing, and executing test automation for UI test automation using Selenium WebDriver.
At least 3 years of working experience in automating the web application using Cypress with JavaScript.
Experience in using Performance test tools, like LoadRunner or Jmeter.
Working knowledge of AWS. (Good to have)
Develop comprehensive test strategies, plans, and test cases to effectively cover functional, regression, and performance testing.
Highly experienced in test automation and development experience.

Note: Candidate must physically reside in the Canadian region to be considered for this position.
